---
id: delete-ring-group
title: "Delete a ring group"
description: "Deletes an existing ring group asynchronously. Returns an operation object to track the deletion progress."
sidebar_label: "Delete a ring group"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "delete api-method"

custom_edit_url: null
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete a ring group"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/ring-groups/{ringGroupId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Deletes an existing ring group asynchronously. Returns an operation object to track the deletion progress.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"X-Request-Id","in":"header","description":"Optional request identifier for tracking","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},{"name":"ringGroupId","in":"path","description":"Unique identifier of the ring group to delete","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
